function_description: Navigate between different projects/boards by clicking on their names.
initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards web app and the sidebar is visible with the list of projects and boards.
steps: Locate the name of the project or board in the sidebar.
Click on the name to navigate to the selected project or board.
expected_state: The user is navigated to the selected project or board, which is highlighted with a blueish color, indicating the current selection.
